query: What types of sensors are now capable of estimating physical activity levels and physiological outcomes of older adults?
predict: Wearable sensors capable of estimating physical activity levels and physiological outcomes of older adults include accelerometers, gyroscope, electrodermal activity (EDA), photoplethysmography (PPG). Additionally, ambient sensors capture movement patterns and behaviors.
